channel.title: Server lag when i log in, someone help?
channel.description:
when i start my server and log into moparscape it lags alot and it just logs me out again, someone told me to reduce the 'maxplayers' in the sourcefile but which one is it??? eg : player? playerhandler? client? playersave? server?
someone tell me , free adminship to whoever does

item.title: Server lag when i log in, someone help?
item.dc:creator: @william william
item.description:
@william wrote:

its something like that but someone told me i should reduce the amount of max players to around 20, but if somone gave me a snippet of it i could put it in ‘find’ and try and locate it[br][size=1]Posted at: November 05, 2006, 09:28:25 AM[/size][hr]bump, smoone help pl0x

Read full topic
